t: For the director of music. Of David. A petition.
Hasten,*pn O God, to save me; come*ld quickly, Lord,*s to help me.
May*pn those who want to take my life be*ld put to shame and confusion; may*ln all who desire my ruin be*ld turned back in disgrace.
May*ln those who say to me, “Aha! Aha!” turn*ld back because of their shame.
But*ln may all who seek you rejoice*ld and be glad in you; may*ln those who long for your saving help always say, “The*ld Lord*s is great!”
But*pn as for me, I am poor and needy; come*ld quickly to me, O God. You*ln are my help and my deliverer; Lord,*sld do not delay.
